backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor placeholder with no logic.
feature_evidence.json: JSON report listing implemented Valentine features, related files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing key frontend files and their roles in the Valentine flow and animations.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base setup defining OKLCH theme tokens for light/dark modes and applying global background/text styles.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root component rendering ValentineExperience and a fixed footer with caffeine.ai attribution.
frontend/src/features/valentine/Fake404S: Fake 404 screen showing large alert visuals and text, used as the intro step before auto-transitioning.
frontend/src/features/valentine/HeartFie: Floating heart animation generator that continuously spawns hearts in warm or blue variants.
frontend/src/features/valentine/SuccessS: Success UI with blue heart animations and the message “I Love you Karuvaya.”
frontend/src/features/valentine/useEvasi: Hook controlling randomized evasive movement for the No button based on pointer proximity.
frontend/src/features/valentine/Valentin: State controller switching between fake404, prompt, and success phases with timed transition.
Prompt screen showing the question, warm hearts, a Yes button, and an evasive No button.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React hook creating and refreshing a backend actor based on Internet Identity authentication.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and provider for managing Internet Identity login state, exposing identity, login, logout, and status helpers. Handles AuthClient creation, stored identity loading, and login flow tracking.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base layers, color variables, global styles, and themed animations such as floating and pulsing hearts. Supports light/dark modes and Valentine-themed palette.
frontend/src/lib/utils.ts: Exports a helper function that merges class names using clsx and tailwind-merge for deduplicated Tailwind classes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wrapping it with React Query and the InternetIdentityProvider before rendering App.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors, radii, fonts, animations, and plugins like typography and container-queries.
project_state.json: Describes project goals and features for a Valentine-themed website, outlining flow requirements and theming constraints.
